Articles.Content:
Colani is a famous german designer who made a lot of rather flowing designs for all types of things.

I just stumbled over this webpage: http://www.darkroastedblend.com/2008/05/extravagant-designs-by-luigi-colani.html which also happens to contain a Spaceshuttle of some sort and thougt I would relink that here for others looking for inspiration.
Very cool. It would be rather hard to recreate these with stock parts, but maybe with the awesome modding community it could be done...
